## IRoles.admin property

This admin role allows the wallet to modify contract metadata and [grant](./sdk.modulewithroles.grantrole.md) and [revoke](./sdk.modulewithroles.revokerole.md) Roles.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
admin: "admin";
```
